column2:
The channels of power require an eye for detail, a fine touch, and a silver tongue. Let our people focus our energies into refining these qualities so we may be masters over those who are less.. refined.

§YThe modifiers for this NV are:§W
§GDiplomatic Points Generation: +100%
Base Influence Points Generation: +20%
CB Generation Speed: +15%§W

Our people must look forward, ignoring the wanton worries of our rivals. Wield logic and rationality to march forward!

§YThe modifiers for this NV are:§W
§GEducation Efficiency: +20%
Research Points Modifier: +15%§W

The foreigners progress and dominate through an orderly and organized society, based on a sense of duty to their country. If we were to embrace this ideal, we might strive as they do.

§YThe modifiers for this NV are:§W
§G2% Soldier Promotion Chance
Organization Regain Rate: +10%§W

The foreigners progress through an industrious society based on hard work. If we were to embrace this ideal, we might progress as they do.

§YThe modifiers for this NV are:§W
§GRGO Throughput: +10%
Factory Input: -5%
Factory Output: +5%
Industry Tech Research Bonus: 5%§W

The foreigners progress through a society based on strong leadership, obedience and loyalty. If we were to embrace this ideal, we might progress as they do.

§YThe modifiers for this NV are:§W
§GRuling Party Support: +30%
Leadership Modifier: 100%§W

It is time for our nation to change the character of our people, to encourage them to embrace the values of equality and social fairness above all else.

§YThe modifiers for this NV are:§W
§GBonus Assimilation Rate: +35%
Culture Tech Research Bonus: 5%§W

It is time for our nation to change the character of our people, to encourage them to embrace the values of liberty and personal freedom above all else.

§YThe modifiers for this NV are:§W
§GPolitical Reform Desire: +12.5%
§GSocial Reform Desire: +12.5%
Commerce Tech Research Bonus: 5%
 Your Nation may radicalize, be careful!§W
